name: Criminal
description: Involved in illegal activities.

name: Sociopath
description: Someone skilled at managing others in sole pursuit of his or her own satisfaction.

name: Firebrand
description: Appeals to the anger and fear of an uncritical audience.

name: Demagogue
description: An influential rabble-rouser who plays to the basest instincts of the public.

name: Rich
description: Has vast sums to call on, but disliked in egalitarian nations.

name: Billionaire
description: Access to truly obscene amounts of money, to the point of unpopularity in nations that prize equality.

name: Eminent
description: Influential among elites, but well-known enough to sometimes attract unwanted attention.

name: Famous
description: Broadly known among elites and the public.

name: Megastar
description: A person of global renown, whose very movements make the news worldwide.

name: Opinion Leader
description: A respected commentator on public affairs, whose words reach many in free nations.

name: Media Darling
description: A popular speaker on media channels in free nations.

name: Elder Statesman
description: A widely respected and influential member of the political elite.

name: Averse
description: Flouts elite conventions, gaining influence among the masses at some personal risk.

name: Paranoid
description: Sees enemies everywhere. Only right some of the time.

name: Ethical
description: A person of principle who believes not all means are justified by their end.

name: Pacifist
description: Personally refuses to take part in any violent action.

name: Academic
description: Affiliated with a research university.

name: Awkward Genius
description: Poor at recognizing social cues and working with others but able to conduct scientific investigations with unparalleled focus.

name: Brazen
description: Flouts elite conventions, gaining influence among the masses at some personal risk.

name: Conspiracy Theorist
description: Sees connections between events that others will not. Occasionally right about them.

name: Corrupt
description: Influential, but will steal from us.

name: Cynic
description: Difficult to fool, but expresses little hope for humanity's future.

name: Demanding
description: Does not tolerate failure from anyone.

name: Expert
description: An oft-quoted speaker on topics in a certain realm of expertise.

name: Family Ties

effects.loyalty_loss: Loses loyalty if home nation is hit with a Strategic Nuclear Barrage

description: Feels a strong connection to their homeland and has family there.

name: Lone Wolf
description: Does not work well with others, but skilled at secretive activity.

name: Martyr

effects.effect_on_death: If it dies violently owner receives Public Campaign effects in every nation

description: A violent death will draw millions to their cause.

name: National Hero
description: Well known and influential in his or her home nation.

name: Oligarch
description: Has gained riches via political power; influential in nations with high inequality.

name: Suspicious
description: Naturally inclined to distrust others.

name: Technocrat
description: Believes that social relations are simply an engineering problem.

name: Furtive
description: A secretive and often negative personality.

name: Inscrutable
description: Never seems to express a strong opinion.

name: Pollyanna
description: Always expresses a sunny outlook on events, regardless of their reality.

name: Extremist
description: Utterly devoted to the cause and holds those who aren't in low regard.

name: Fanatic
description: An absolute true believer who lacks an understanding of certain subtleties of dealing with the world.
